qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: SaaS vendors seem to prefer value-based to cost-based orientation in software pricing. Value is what clients really want to pay for.
qualitative_analysis.justification: A citação discute explicitamente a orientação de precificação baseada em valor como preferência dos fornecedores SaaS, alinhando-se com estratégias de precificação e modelo de entrega.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: SaaS vendors tend to target broad markets to gain economy of scale...To survive and thrive, vendors are supposed to expand clients base continuously in order to leverage on economy of scale
qualitative_analysis.justification: A passagem enfatiza economias de escala e expansão de mercado como fatores críticos de sucesso para fornecedores SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: SaaS vendors are hence compelled to steadily improve service quality and price it accordingly in order to retain a sizeable pool of clients
qualitative_analysis.justification: Destaca a melhoria contínua da qualidade do serviço e precificação adequada como essenciais para retenção de clientes.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: usage-based pricing strategies were popular among SaaS vendors because usage-based metrics reflect both vendors' costs to deliver services and clients' costs to consume services
qualitative_analysis.justification: A citação descreve estratégias de precificação baseadas em uso que refletem custos de fornecedor e cliente.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Adopting pricing components from different categories could help in accommodating diverse client preferences...some SaaS vendors included pricing components from different categories in their pricing strategies
qualitative_analysis.justification: Destaca estratégias de precificação flexíveis que acomodam diversas preferências de clientes como fator de sucesso.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: customers or delivery channels are the main driving force to the selection of the most appropriate pricing and revenue model in the market
qualitative_analysis.justification: A citação indica que as necessidades dos clientes orientam a seleção do modelo de precificação, refletindo uma abordagem focada em valor.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: software firms can use flexible revenue and pricing strategies to make the service more attractive for customers
qualitative_analysis.justification: Destaca estratégias de precificação flexíveis como fator que torna o serviço mais atrativo.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: The rental model through the public cloud decreased the production costs of case firms... made it possible to offer the software at a lower price

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
